kasper.title: ðŸ‘» KASPER
kasper.subtitle: Karma Assessment and Player Evaluation Resource

canPlayersView.name: Can Players View?
canPlayersView.hint: When enabled, factions will default to visible for players. Enable this setting to show all factions by default. Leave disabled to hide all factions by default.

settings.minify.name: Use Minified Look?
settings.minify.hint: This will make the UI smaller and more compact. Please be warned that this overlays the reputation label over the colored bar and may be hard to read on some colors.

trigger.name: Activation Method?
trigger.hint: How do you want to activate the KASPER UI? Dialog will add a button to the Journal Sidebar Header. Pinned will pin the window above the notes under the Journal Sidebar Tab.

disableWheel.name: Disable Mouse Wheel?
disableWheel.hint: When enabled, the mouse wheel will not be able to adjust the reputation value unless the user is holding the CTRL key.
disableWheel.hintDisabled: DISABLED: This setting is disabled when '{moduleTitle}' is enabled. Please use that module to configure how you would like this modules range inputs to function.

config.name: Configure Global Defaults
config.hint: This is the default values used for all reputation trackers. You can right click and configure individual tracker values in the Manager window.
config.label: Configure Global Defaults

setAltTitle.label: Alternative Title
setAltTitle.hint: When not blank, this value will be showed to the players instead of the default title. This is useful when hiding the faction name from players.

override.name: Define Unique Settings
override.hint: This will override the parent settings for this element and its children.

presets.name: Load Preset
presets.hint: This will load a preset of values for use with the selected reputation tracker.
presets.custom.name: Custom
presets.inherit.name: Inherit

minimum.name: Lowest Reputation Value
minimum.hint: This is the lowest value a reputation can be. This is usually the most negative value.

maximum.name: Highest Reputation Value
maximum.hint: This is the highest value a reputation can be. This is usually the most positive value.

default.name: Default Reputation Value
default.hint: This is the default value a reputation will be set to when a new faction is added.

colorize.name: Colorize Reputation Bar?
colorize.hint: This will colorize the reputation bar based on the reputation value.

overwriteGlobalDefaults.title: Override Global Defaults
overwriteGlobalDefaults.content: Warning! This will override the Global Defaults with these settings. Are you sure you want to continue?

updatePreset.title: Update {title} Preset
updatePreset.content: Warning! This will overwrite the {title} preset, meaning any trackers using this preset will be updated. Are you sure you want to continue?

custom.title: Create a New Custom Preset
custom.label: Preset Name
custom.hint: Please enter a preset title. This title will be used to create an easy to find selector when using KASPER.

tooltips.overrideGlobalDefaults: Hold SHIFT to override Global Defaults

notifications.error.overwriteGlobalDefaultsRejected: {title}: User choose to not overwrite Global Defaults. Preset was not updated!
notifications.error.noPresetTitle: {title}: Preset Title is Required when creating a new custom preset. Preset was not created!
notifications.error.presetTitleExists: {title}: {preset} already exists as a preset. Preset was not created!
notifications.error.presetTitleProtected: {title}: {preset} is a protected keyword and cannot be used. Preset was not updated!
